news.title: Madras High Court Launches Tamil Language Interface
news.content: The Madras High Court has launched a comprehensive Tamil language interface for its digital services, making legal proceedings more accessible to Tamil-speaking litigants and promoting linguistic diversity in the judicial system.

news.title: Coastal Environment Protection Directives
news.content: The Madras High Court has issued detailed directives for coastal environment protection, addressing issues of marine pollution, fishing rights, and sustainable coastal development along Tamil Nadu's extensive coastline.

news.title: Education Rights and School Infrastructure
news.content: The Madras High Court has directed the Tamil Nadu government to ensure proper school infrastructure, qualified teachers, and quality education access, particularly focusing on rural and underprivileged areas.
